to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Don't exhaust yourself or minor health problems will set in.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓自己太疲憊，否則健康問題會乘虛而入的。

sentences.english: This in turn will take advantage of the extreme forces of convenience.
sentences.chinese: 這又會給極端勢力乘虛而入帶來便利。

sentences.english: Typhoid fever sneaks in when sanitation fails.
sentences.chinese: 環境衛生搞不好，傷寒就會乘虛而入。

sentences.english: Seniors swoop in as young chicks enter their first year in college.
sentences.chinese: 小妞們剛開始大學第一年的生活，學長們就乘虛而入。
